name: Fate/Samurai Remnant: Additional Episode 1 - Record's Fragment: Keian Command Championship
description: The boss suddenly announces the commencement of Keian Command Championship. The winner is given a wish granter, and thus the contestants of the Waxing Moon Ritual begin fighting, all the while the Divine Spirit Ibuki-Douji smiles bewitchingly...

name: Petit Petit Petit: Nightmare Pack
description: For "Petit Petit Petit", downloadable contents 1 additional stage (STAGE-4: Brain Stage) Additional character x 3 types Petapeta Kamii Mr. P This pack includes the following downloadable contents

name: Heroes of War
description: The world is in chaos, heroes are rising, and the public is a high-ranking official. We must take the collection of heroes as our heart, and we can help the Han dynasty and save the people.

name: Inside The Memory
description: [Using Live2D, almost full voice] (Voice is only in Japanese)A mystery that begins with a single invitation received from your uncle.A ``mystery'' that happens to someone who was supposed to be an invited guest. Please try to solve it by yourself.

name: La Voix
description: Navigate complex relationships and unexpected revelations as a transfer student with amnesia in this visual novel adventure. Uncover the truth behind a mysterious dream and the wishes of the campus crush.

name: Happy Telepathy
description: How many good deeds can you do today? It's just another day full of idle chit-chat... But the teensiest act of kindness just might bring you happiness!

name: Lucky Pirate Deck
description: Embark on a thrilling turn-based Pirate Adventure! Spin the deck-building slot, strategize with crew bonuses, and navigate a procedurally generated world. Conquer enemies, choose your path, and become the ultimate pirate in this dynamic roguelike experience!

name: Down is Relative
description: A first-person story-based puzzle game with an emphasis on subverting your current familiarity to gravity. Surpassing physics-based puzzles through the mastery of your newfound gravitational manipulation is crucial. The perfect game for those that enjoy interesting twists and unique puzzle elements.

name: The Social Engineer
description: Become the next top agent with The Social Engineer: explore companies, exploit vulnerabilities, deceive employees, and prevent dangerous attacks. Conduct various targeted assaults on companies to uncover faulty security mechanisms in diverse open-world settings and with realistic VR controls.

name: Demon: Recollect
description: Step into the shoes of an ancient mutant and get thrown into the modern, mortal world. Learn what you can about your past as you don the mask of a villain!

name: Gone Camping!
description: Camping and adventure await you and your Bow & Arrow! Solve puzzles and fight monsters in dungeons or relax and hike the open world. There's fun and excitement for everyone when you're Gone Camping!

name: Kendo Warrior
description: Kendo Warrior is a realistic samurai sword fighting simulator. In the game, the player will take part in exciting duels in medieval Japan. Realistic animations of the most important moves of kendo warriors will introduce the player to the world of this martial art.

name: Gallop Champion
description: Discover the equestrian world through horse races in numerous 3D racetracks and take up the challenge to win trophies and position yourself in the player rankings! Produce your foals and train your horses. Buy your personal goods with precious stones.

name: Emery Hearts
description: Immerse yourself in this thrilling action JRPG and uncover the secrets of Emery crystals as you face challenging enemies that will demand all your skill and ingenuity to defeat them.

name: Kanhoji's Island
description: Welcome to 'Kanhoji's Island'! Join the thrilling Ludo adventure where cunning strategy meets pirate conquest. Roll the dice, outmanoeuvre rivals, and become the ultimate master of the high seas. Will you reign supreme in this epic battle for dominance?

name: Eden: Project New Earth
description: Eden: Project New Earth is a first-/third-person open world sci-fi survival game and lets you experience the adventure in single player or multiplayer just the way you like it. Play as you like, on servers or locally, with friends or strangers, together in PVE or against each other in PVP.

name: Lost Princess: City
description: lost princess game series are back. Try to collect items and find princess now at city in this new part of walking simulation game series

name: Kona & Snowrabbit
description: Kona, an ice artist with a reputation for mischief, and Snowrabbit, a white-furred snow rabbit full of desire. After hearing the story of Aquus, the mermaid goddess, the two down-on-their-luck artists break into the monastery of Aquus, nicknamed "the sea on land," to make a statue of a goddess.

name: Snowpult
description: Frosty Cookie clicker with a mad dash of ice cold humour, hit the targets by slinging snowy balls of fury and hope the games narrator isn't awake to mock your failures.

name: Viking Heroes 5
description: Embark on a festive journey as the vikings prepare for Yule! Amidst enchanting festivities, the Viking siblings discover Odin has lost control over the threads of fate, prompting a mysterious journey throughout the famous realms of the nine worlds.

name: Furea Uerzt
description: Your Furea Uerzt adventure awaits! Explore the dynamic Mars landscape. Become a hero who protects Earth from extinction due to a meteor strike. Activates quantum teleportation and future-related electromagnetic fields as a shield. Fun experience Furea Uerzt.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Fast Food
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Challenge
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Military Vehicles
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Rabbits
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzles Infinite: Cats & Dogs Puzzle Pack
description: Sit back, relax and build puzzles to your heart's content. Assemble one of the many included puzzles, or add your own images. Customize size and shape of the pieces for any puzzle. Enjoy Classic mode or try out Zen mode for a new type of puzzle experience.

name: LineArt Jigsaw Puzzle: Airplanes
description: Challening 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring line drawings of iconic airplanes by LineArtBabe, on a smooth background.

name: Van Gogh's Masterpiece Jigsaw Puzzles
description: "Explore the artistic style of Van Gogh in "Van Gogh's Masterpiece Jigsaw Puzzles." Solve intricate puzzles, unlock Steam Achievements, and immerse yourself in a world inspired by a legendary painter."

name: Exoprimal: Witchdoctor Alpha Overlord Set
description: Includes five cosmetic items, including the support "Witchdoctor Alpha" suit skin, which assists allies with a combined offensive and defensive beam. Overlord, the mummy of the monarch who ruled the ancient world! Equip yourself with cosmetic items and pull your allies back from the brink of death!

name: Exoprimal: Zephyr Alpha Fire Dragon Set
description: Includes five cosmetic items, including the Assault "Zephyr Alpha" suit skin, which cuts through remote enemies with its chakram. The Flame Dragon, a bright red dragon that seems to be covered in flames! Equip yourself with the cosmetic items and unleash a fiery onslaught like a raging fire!

name: Exoprimal: Deadeye Alpha Deinonychus Body Set
description: Includes 5 cosmetic items, including the Assault "Deadeye Alpha" suit skin, which uses two different types of projectiles to destroy your enemies. A Deinonychus Body that lets you be just like a real dinosaur! Equip yourself with cosmetic items and bring out your wild instincts to fight!

name: Exoprimal: Skywave Monster Hunter Set
description: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a suit skin based on an armour set made from parts of the electrifying Phantom Beast of legend, Kirin!

name: Exoprimal: Roadblock Monster Hunter Set
description: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a suit skin which makes your exosuit take on the appearance of the ultra-aggressive Rajang, letting you become destruction incarnate!

name: Exoprimal: Barrage Monster Hunter Set
description: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a suit skin based on an armour set made from parts of the terrifying Elder Dragon, Nergigante!

name: Exoprimal: Barrage Alpha Mystic Set
description: Includes 5 cosmetic items, including a suit skin for the assault "Barrage Alpha", which destroys enemies by bombing them with rocket launchers. Mystic, which wears an eerie atmosphere! Equipped with cosmetic items, blow away both enemies and evil spirits with a powerful blast!

name: Exoprimal: Roadblock Alpha Big Bunny Set
description: Includes 5 cosmetic items, including a suit skin for the tank "Roadblock Alpha", which sets up shields and builds defense lines. The fluffy-bodied rabbit♪ Equip him with cosmetic items and he will protect all of his friends♪

name: Exoprimal: Exoprimal Survival Pass Season 3 - Premium Tier
description: These special rewards let you get more out of the wargame!

name: Projeto Real: Treasure Map
description: With the treasure map, you'll finally be able to find all the resources!

name: Gunstorm
description: Gunstorm is a space shooter loaded with playability. Wave after wave of alien craft attack your agile ship. Use the mouse to control your ship at the speed of thought in a perfectly balanced game that starts easy and gradually gets more difficult.

name: Dogs Huddled Together
description: Enjoy a therapeutic dog puzzle game where every piece is an adorable dog. Adjust the difficulty as you like, explore two intriguing puzzle modes, and let hundreds of dogs bring you comfort!

name: Second Thoughts: Terminal
description: Second Thoughts: Terminal is a text-based psychological horror game where you execute a list of people based on gradually revealed information about their lives, all while secretly following a trail laid out by a mysterious messenger.

name: Echoes Of Fear: Whispers in the Abyss
description: Embark on a spine-chilling journey, wielding a dimensional camera to unveil occult mysteries. Decrypt ancient runes as you traverse the enigmatic horrors within. Can you escape the abyssal whispers that echo through the darkness?

name: Unholy Village
description: Joseph and his two friends set out for their village to attend his sister's funeral. However, they strangely have an accident on the way. After the accident, Joseph's friends go missing. While trying to find his friends in an abandoned town, Joseph encounters strange events.

name: Fixer's Tale
description: Welcome to the Scientific Research Facility "Camelot-22". The emergency personnel replacement system has chosen you to address the next unusual contingency. Immerse yourself in the humorous tale of a repair job filled with laughter, silly dialogues, angry chairs, and dim-witted robots.

name: Shootem
description: Welcome to the arena! a fast-paced 2D top-down shooter allows up to 6 players to battle across diverse maps and unique heroes, each equipped with deadly weapons. Are you up for the challenge to rise to the top and become the ultimate hero?

name: Math Dash
description: Test your math skills and reflexes. Fast-paced and challenging, so you will need to be quick on your feet to succeed. With multiple levels of difficulty, Math Dash is perfect for players of all skill levels.

name: Idle Planets
description: Idle Planets is a game where your objective is to extract the maximum amount of minerals in a galaxy with different planets, aiming to become the master of the universe.

name: The Head Well Lost
description: An otome visual novel about a librarian and a pop star without a head.

name: Desolar
description: Desolar is a turn-based tactical dungeon crawler that incorporates elements of a card battler. The game merges the classic look and feel of 90s retro RPGs with the strategic depth of chess.

name: Dodecadone
description: A physics & logic puzzler about merging shapes and traits, similar to Suika games. A triangle might be bouncy, your septagon sick & coughing, or an ennenagon defying the laws of physics.

name: Rhythm Soccer
description: Play with football teams from Brazil, Argentina, Italy, and Germany in an amazing rhythm game! Hit the notes to pass and shoot and win the tournament! With cartoonish visuals and 15 manually synchronized songs, have a lot of fun! Download now and experience the excitement of the rhythm of football!

name: The Other Side
description: Embark on a chilling co-op adventure in The Other Side, an action packed horror experience. Customize your gear, strategize with friends, and uncover paranormal mysteries. Are you prepared to face the unknown together in this immersive supernatural experience?

name: Macho Mick
description: Embark on the unique journey of Macho Mick, a gaming experience combining 2D and 3D worlds. Battle enemies, collect coins in 2D, then unlock exciting 3D arcade games. Earn tickets for upgrades, explore themed areas, and conquer roguelike challenges. A captivating experience for all skill levels!

name: E-Lich: Corporate Souls
description: There’s no R.I.P at E-Lich Corp! Explore the afterlife in this roguelite bullet heaven that is all about humor, insane power-levels, replayability and awful office jokes. Reap souls along your undead coworkers in a company that values your life. And death. Literally.

name: Skyward Dream
description: Explore the depths of your mind in Skyward Dream. A first-person platforming adventure set within the interconnected layers of your mind. Navigate surreal dreamscapes, unlock platforming abilities, and confront your inner demons. Can you overcome the challenges of your subconsciousness?

name: Hungry Legion
description: What is the hungriest you have ever been? We're done with farming for this year. It didn't go well. In years like this, everyone knows what's coming next. The empire will try to extract every last bit from the peasants. Kick out imperial leeches in tragic battles against impossible odds.

name: Haikuna
description: Haikuna is a word search game set inside The Wonderful Wizard of Oz, Journey to the Center of the Earth, and Don Quixote. Players teleport around these stories to find the words to haiku written in the Nanboku-chō, Edo, Genroku, & Meji eras of Japan.

name: Hydropunk
description: Single-player action-adventure game with an isometric camera, combining a souls-like combat system and emergent mechanics of immersive sims. Set in the grimdark decaying underground world of hydro-powered machinery, inspired by the Industrial Revolution Era and Lovecraftian Horrors.

name: In The Hell
description: Após receber uma missão de investigar uma prisão em uma ilha isolada, o Detetive Ethan precisa encontrar a sua filha, ao mesmo tempo que precisa sobreviver a horrores inimagináveis que vieram do próprio inferno.

name: Tug of War
description: A simple one-button clicker game. Play a tug-of-war as a witch trying to use cute cats as her familiars! The pixel-style pictures and lively 8-bit music are the attractive points.

name: Pendant
description: Uncover the secrets of an ancient land while you talk with gods, enhance your magical capabilities, and take down monsters and demons.

name: The Forgotten Cabin!
description: You're placed in a small, isolated house in the midst of a dense forest. The experience is concise, lasting about 10 minutes, during which you witness a series of eerie and potentially supernatural events.

name: Escape From Inferno
description: Escape From Inferno is a top-down shooter where you play as an angel named Lordrid to escape Hell. There are 10 stages and your goal is to survive the hordes of enemies until there are none left.

name: Courtin' Cowboys
description: It's 1863 and you, the player, are traveling through the small western town of Summerfair. Meet up to 7 love interests and discover their deliciously dark pasts... as well as their current horrifying misdeeds.

name: Nova Historia
description: A unique 4X real-time historical strategy game, set on a procedurally generated globe. Play from ancient times, right through to the modern day. Expand your empire, build settlements, units, buildings and construct world wonders. Make History, Your Way.

name: Projeto Real: Fishing Kit
description: Available fishing kit for you, a fishing enthusiast starting your career.

name: The Hovanets, The Keeper of The Enchanted Tree
description: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a Carpathian fairy tale. Together with the house-elf Hovanets, save the life of the tree and reveal the secrets of the abandoned house hidden inside.

name: Karina Katana
description: A "Sidescroller" Adventure with Fight Mechanics and Leveling System for your skills and items.

name: Teacher of prophecy
description: This is a very interesting simulation business game.

name: Real Traveler
description: There is no such thing as a story. In a world erosion by monsters, I, a villager, will stand up! You can use money to increase friends, strengthen equipment, and buy houses. Organize your life, defeat monsters with your fellow, and explore the vast world!

name: Lover
description: Lover is a first-person psychological horror game. Presented in a nostalgic and retro environment, player will uncover the cause of the illness through reincarnation and overcome psychological issues. Before darkness consumes your world, find those unspeakable secrets as you face shattered reality.

name: They Come At Night
description: Explore an abandoned island, scavenge for resources, keep the fire alive, and hide from a deadly threat. Good luck, and beware of the dark.

name: IceFishingVR
description: This game is a VR fishing game set on an icy river in the cold winter of a specific region, and the goal is to catch a variety of fish that can be found in the region.

name: Puzzle Club
description: This is a mysterious and challenging puzzle game that includes various types of puzzles and mechanisms, such as numeric passwords, graphic passwords, text passwords, etc. Each puzzle requires careful thinking to find the correct answer.

name: Real Life
description: Here is RealLife RP, a French roleplay and multiplayer simulation game. In this game, play the person you want and start your new life!

name: Misha's incident
description: Play as Misha, a girl with an unpleasant personality and a not very high level of intelligence. Help her raise funds to repay debts and thereby prevent a tragic end to her life. Explore the peculiar city, look for a job, and make new strange acquaintances.

name: Buck Swash and the Idol of Tak'Mahud
description: A 2D adventure, puzzle platformer heavily inspired by action/adventure movies. Traverse rich environments by jumping, ledge grabbing, and rope swinging. Uncover lost knowledge through exploration and puzzle solving.

name: Cogstellation
description: Cogstellation is a space mining game based entirely around connecting gears around. Improve your ship to be the space travel machine that you know it can be, colonize the solar system by defeating the existing colonies, and improve your base with the best mining and crafting equipment you can get.

name: Spacern Tales
description: Spacern Tales is a turn-based tactical strategy. After enduring hard times, you have finally gotten lucky and won on a galaxy scratchcard. However, the hardest part is getting to the exchange point. Your adventure begins there: protect your company, defeat space pirates and enemies!

name: Farm Frontier
description: Dive into an immersive experience where you can create, manage and develop your own farm while exploring essential aspects of agriculture, construction, management, nature, and economy.

name: Unknown Tapes
description: You are the prey. Unknown Tapes is a horror video game that employs the found footage technique to narrate a story focused on survive in a modern setting overrun by dinosaurs. It aims for realism and draws inspiration from Dino Crisis and Outlast.

name: SUF 30k
description: Take on the role of one of the fighters of the legendary 21st SUF unit! You need to retrieve a very special item!

name: Raiders of Treasure Island
description: This is a multiplayer action-competitive game where you use mystical powers to become the ruler of the world! Warriors, gunmen, wizards... Dig up treasures buried deep underground. If you can make it out alive, they will all be yours. Gather your friends and join together in a hunting team.

name: The Little Witch and The Lost Memories
description: The Little Witch and The Lost Memories is an exploration-based adventure game set in the dreams of a girl who has lost her memories. The game's story unfolds as she uncovers various secrets while exploring her dream world.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Cats 2
description: Puzzles of cats!

name: Move It!
description: A retro-style, puzzle game in which your task is to move a square to the designated place in as few moves as possible. However, not everything is as it seems. At some point, the player starts to experience strange anomalies and bugs of strange origin.

name: Pinky's Paradigm
description: Grab, drop, and throw nearly every piece of the puzzle in Pinky's Paradigm, a pure but charming puzzle platformer that repurposes common tropes into interesting mechanics. Solve puzzles composed of individual pieces that you can move at will, defusing "bombs", hurdling chasms. and much more.

name: Rogue's Hexagon
description: A turn-based puzzle game set in a hexagonal world where you strategically move and throw powerful daggers to solve dozens of puzzles and optional challenges.

name: Combasters
description: Combasters is an intense strategy game with elements of tower defense, Combasters are masters who will help you combine elements to win.

name: M.O.Z.I.
description: M.O.Z.I. - A post-apocalyptic FPS with elements of horror and tower defense. Deadly Wasteland, Dying Planet: radiation, mutants, aliens and savages are all out to get you. Defend yourself, gather food and resources, and upgrade your equipment. Survive.

name: Cult of Abaruth
description: Have you always felt that you were destined for great things? Have you dreamed of being the leader of a dark cult? Or maybe you just love Dark Fantasy with a touch of humor? Now you have the opportunity to test your skills! Take on the role of a cult leader and lead him to glory!

name: Glory to Ukraine!
description: On February 24, Russia invaded Ukraine. Your task is kill the invaders. Use any available weapons: knive and axe, machine gun and grenades. Be careful, the enemy is crafty and merciless. The fate of Ukraine depends on you.

name: Scrap Metal Heroes Rebuilt
description: Scrap Metal Heroes Rebuilt is a real-time strategy game where you can customize a set of 4 robots with over 300 parts and fight them against an AI opponent or other players.

name: TD Designer
description: In TD designer, you, as a newbie game designer, are assigned to playtest an reverse tower defense game. Recruit a team of adventurers, collect powerful relics and beat down enemys in various levels. After being more experienced, you'll engage more in the game-dev progess.

name: Foragery
description: Washed up on the shore of an abandoned island, you need to find your way back home. As you explore the top-down 2D world of Foragery, the adventure and story will captivate you. Explore the various buildings and climates on the islands and uncover a story that calls for more than you bargained for.

name: Calrivar Cluster
description: An Accessibility First Real Time Strategy Game, built from the ground up to work with only one hand and limited sight. Entirely single player all movement and control is preformed via keyboard, the camera system was designed around the physical layout of the number pad on keyboards.

name: Immortalis
description: Immortalis is a roguelike game that focus on the exhausting side of Dracula's immortality. Every time he dies, he needs to cross the underworld to return. Is immortality a blessing or a burden? Time to find out.

name: WhyTaoism
description: Why Taoism Is an adventure game that explores spirituality and transcendence. In this game, players will take on the role of a group of beings who follow the legends of the ancient immortals and hope to ascend in order to transcend.

name: Polygon Bit Battle Royale
description: Polygon Bit Battle Royale is a low-poly, massive multiplayer shooter, supporting 50 players per server. Battle on a large scale map with various vehicles combats. Land, loot and survive to win the battle!

name: Shovel Pirate
description: X marks the spot! Follow the map and find hidden treasures.

name: Jelly Belly
description: Jelly Belly - is an action-packed arena shooter with endless waves of monsters. Increase your damage and battle using a diverse arsenal. Survive and eliminate all enemies, spreading panic on the arena!

name: Guardian: Defense to Others
description: It's a single-tower defense game that subjugates monsters and clears rounds.

name: Method to Madness
description: Defend against waves of enemies with a strategic mix of spellcasting and tower defense. Explore new spells, towers, and artifacts in each run and discover your own playstyle in this rougelike Tower Defense game.

name: Frankendice
description: Embark on a dice-rolling adventure through Frankenstein's lair! Use your wits to escape and navigate diverse 3D environments. Experience complex movements, face tearing, and diverse obstacles. Solve puzzles in a challenging 3D grid and strategically rearrange modular dice.

name: Huntsmen
description: Surrealist, physics sandbox survival horror, third person exploration shooter, set in post-depopulation Sydney, Australia with a simulated ecosystem populated by evolving animals via a natural selection dynamic, and a mercenary war. 90s FMV aesthetic for hybrid of nostalgia and modern look.

name: Swashbuckler's Xmas
description: An action-packed holiday adventure full of pirates, snowballs, and the occasional yeti. Explore the North Pole in this third-person action adventure game for all ages.

name: Sidewards
description: A realistic stone skipping simulator with a chill vibe.

name: Go To Hell Must
description: Want to decide where mortals go when they die? Welcome to hell! With one click, you can decide whether mortals should go to heaven or stay in hell.

name: Diary of a Zomboni Driver
description:
What do hockey pucks, a midwife of the dead, and a plot to turn the lives of great players into evil tribute all have in common? They’re all found in the latest and greatest RPG for the Nintendo Entertainment System! Travel the underworld as an undead superstar athlete, battle monster hockey teams, find new gear and abilities, and take on an evil sports agent demigod!

Skate hard. Shoot straight. The Zombie Hockey League is in your living room!

name: Droste Effect
description: Explore the peculiar tale of Droste Effect, a captivating 2D puzzle game. Confront the mysterious past of your new home with Alexandra, uncover secrets, and manage your sanity in an intense adventure. Rediscover the power of memories as you dive into a past that will reshape your present.

name: VR Cop Simulator
description: Dive into a voice-controlled VR cop simulator, where humor meets intense drama. Engage in realistic talks with AI characters, navigate tough situations, and make impactful decisions. Your virtual journey awaits!

name: Forest legend
description: This is a realistic simulation flight driving game,

name: Pepa's Adventure
description: Pepa's Adventure: a papercut point-and-click book. The characters and backgrounds are crafted from handmade papercut art. Pepa, a paper fairy girl, lived with book fairy Lex. One day, scissor fairy Slash cut and stole his pages. Pepa embarks on an adventure to recover stolen pages.

name: Sol Cesto
description: Sol Cesto is a tactical and frenetic roguelite in which you have to master your luck. Choose a hero and reach the bottom of a random dungeon. In this grim world, every action has consequences...

name: Nine Card Isle
description: Experience a classic 2-Player card game based on 9 Hole Golf in an immersive fantasy setting. Play locally against your friends, take on the adventure mode, or jump online to challenge players from around the world with cross-platform multiplayer.

name: Ssen
description: Enjoy spectacular action with easy Controls. Upgrade awesome weapons. Collect various artifacts.

name: DarkStorm
description: Play as MARS (Machine of Absolute Retaliation and Safeguard), a robot programmed to exterminate the treacherous aliens who have taken over Razor City. As MARS, you must free Razor City from its domination in order to save the survivors from their doom.

name: Room 13
description: You are inside an endless hotel but there is a way you can escape. Search in the hallways of the hotel and find the changes within them to reach Room 13.

name: Fresh Hell
description: Restore your home planet to be the thriving wasteland it once was, in order to reboot everyone you know. Venture out into space, gather resources to fix your home, and piece together the mystery of how (and why) the plants have taken over.

name: My IShowSpeed
description: Here you can go all the way from scratch, pump your muscles, become a professional soccer player, earn a fortune, and much more! You and your Speedy will never get bored, because there are tons of mini-games and fun activities in the game!

name: Stack & the Grumblepuff from Above
description: Play as a stack of blobs with an addiction to coins - it's really in your best interest to avoid the hazards - but how else will you collect all the treasure? And where are those hazards falling from?

name: Empty₁: First-Person Adventure
description: Empty₁: First-Person Adventure is a first-person action-adventure game set in the 1950s. Outstanding scientists and great minds of the Soviet Union united in the revolutionary development of a colossally new historical community.

name: Factory Business Management
description: Build factories, manage resources, research new technologies, try to locate the best markets to sell your products. Keep building, managing resources, researching and selling. Repeat, fail, learn, repeat, succeed, grow

name: Forged in Epic

Scoring for matches is based on kills, collective team levels, objective completion, and more. CHO also includes questing, from daily objectives to hero quests.
